title: Did the game just DC for anyone else?
body: Wont let me back in....... i need to know if its just me or because of the maintenance

replies.body: Is this issue still happening?  There's currently a[ ranked maintenance](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/dueFAHzX-719-ranked-disabled-probably-when-youore-asleep) going on, but it shouldn't impact you.  We can take a look to be sure though, download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and route to 104.160.131.1 for a few minutes.  Let me know what you find!

My friend and I just experienced a server issue, and she was reported afk for it, now has a 20min wait for 5 games! Anyway to resolve this? She has proof that she couldn't play due to the "waiting to connect" error.

its happening to many people, my friend kept having it happen to him and just had a game of aram where 3 ppl dropped at the same second on my team but none on enemy team. hopefully they fix the issue soon, until then, try to be patient i guess!
